descriptions:
['DescriptionEspace Real Estate are proud to present this incredible 5 bed B type property in Calida Village with an upgraded kitchen. Boasting an 11,000 sqft plot, this exceptional villa overlooks the Golf Course and features living spaces with generous dimensions, a large plot with a beautiful swimming pool and entertainment area that over looks the pool. The garden has many features including a seating area with real fire, outside gazebo with TV, hot tub and BBQ area costing over AED 1 million. Upstairs are 4 bedrooms that are all en suite and have great views from the balconies. Location is ideal in this quiet section in Calida that is close to multiple exits. Viewing is highly advised.
-Type B
-5 Bedrooms
